debates.showAs: Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the implementation of an affordable school uniform policy in schools; and for this purpose, to amend the Education Act 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar cur i ngníomh beartais éidí scoile inacmhainne i scoileanna; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Education Act 1998 and certain regulations made under that Act for the purpose of allowing a certain timeframe to be specified in respect of students with special educational needs when an application is made for admission to a school and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998 agus rialacháin áirithe arna ndéanamh faoin Acht sin chun go gceadófar creat ama áirithe a shonrú i leith mic léinn a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta oideachais acu nuair a dhéantar iarratas ar ligean isteach i scoil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the implementation of an affordable school uniform policy in schools; and for this purpose to amend the Education Act of 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar cur i ngníomh beartais éidí scoile inacmhainne i scoileanna; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.

debates.showAs: Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Freedom of Information Act 2014 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shaoráil Faisnéise, 2014 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create a single competent authority to co-ordinate flood risk and management along the River Shannon and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú údarás inniúil aonair chun priacal agus bainistiú tuile a chomhordú feadh Abhainn na Sionainne agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhaireacht Bainistíochta Abhainn na Sionainne, 2020
